about_the_game:
Humans exploited the earth to a point of no return. For centuries people overlooked the effects of their inconsiderate behavior and what is now left of their lively and nurturing world is a barren wasteland. Humanity is on the verge of extinction. You are part of an army of androids equipped with highly intelligent and sensible AI, designed to travel through space in search of a potential exoplanet that humans can populate in order to save themselves. Your job is to build your arsenal and train at zero gravity during this galactic journey to face and fight the possible threats that could be found once landed.

Build your arsenal

Get access to an armory and use resources to choose your weapons before each fight. Each weapon have different abilities and characteristics, upgrade them as you progress and level up your stats. Create your strategy and fight for the victory

Training

Improve your skills by training your aim accuracy and reflexes. Choose the difficulty level and compete for the first place on the leaderboard.

Zero gravity arena

Fly at zero gravity and fight against your enemies. Avoid its shot and try to beat them. After each fight your enemy becomes stronger and its aim more precise. Win ten fights to conquer the victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 - 8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: All PCVR headsets
